original_text:
Blessed is the man who makes
    the Lord his trust,
who does not turn to the proud,
    to those who go astray after a lie!
korean_text: 여호와를 의지하고 교만한 자와 거짓에 치우치는 자를 돌아보지 아니하는 자는 복이 있도다

sentences.original_text: who makes the Lord his trust
who does not turn to the proud
to those who go astray after a lie!
